targets.query:
FinalOutput = ["Time", "State"]

RawSeries =from(bucket: "operation")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "service_state" and r._field =~ /state|service/ )
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.service == "${var_services}")

NamedSeries = RawSeries
    |> map(fn: (r) => ({"Time":r._time, "State":r.state}))
    |> keep(columns:FinalOutput)
    
NamedSeries |> yield()
targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
  up_time, 
  datetime at TIME zone 'UTC' AS "time"
FROM mon_service_state_operation_day this
WHERE 
  this.mon_service_id = (SELECT id FROM mon_service WHERE name = '${var_service}') AND
  $__timeFilter(datetime at TIME zone 'UTC') 
ORDER BY datetime

SELECT  
  AVG(up_time) 
FROM  
  mon_service_state_operation_day 
WHERE 
  mon_service_id = (SELECT id FROM mon_service WHERE name='$var_service') AND 
  $__timeFilter(datetime at TIME zone 'UTC')

targets.query:
FinalOutput = ["Time", "Service", "State" ]

RawSeries =from(bucket: "operation")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "service_state" and r._field =~ /state|service/ )
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.service == "${var_services}")

NamedSeries = RawSeries
    |> map(fn: (r) => ({"Time":r._time, "Service":r.service, "State":r.state, }))
    |> keep(columns:FinalOutput)
    
NamedSeries |> yield()

  $__timeFilter(datetime at TIME zone 'UTC') 
ORDER BY datetime

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
  ROUND(up_time::numeric, 2) AS "Up Time", 
  mon_service.name AS "Service",
  datetime at TIME zone 'UTC' AS "time"
FROM mon_service_state_operation_day this
INNER JOIN mon_service ON mon_service.id = this.mon_service_id
WHERE 
  $__timeFilter(datetime at TIME zone 'UTC') 
ORDER BY datetime

list.definition:
SELECT mon_service.name
FROM mon_service_state_operation
INNER JOIN mon_service on mon_service_state_operation.mon_service_id = mon_service.id
WHERE $__timeFilter(mon_service_state_operation.datetime at TIME zone 'UTC')
GROUP BY 1;
list.label: Services
list.name: var_service
list.query:
SELECT mon_service.name
FROM mon_service_state_operation
INNER JOIN mon_service on mon_service_state_operation.mon_service_id = mon_service.id
WHERE $__timeFilter(mon_service_state_operation.datetime at TIME zone 'UTC')
GROUP BY 1;
